name: Jet Water Stunts 3d
description:
Jet Water Stunts 3d is the best pro speed Jet Ski rider beach racing game and complete all the thrilling boat challenges in uphill rush water sliding game. Be the best professional speed and complete all the thrilling boat challenges in jetski rush water park racing game.
How to Play:

- Tilt to steer the powerboat
- Touch bottom right gas button to accelerate
- Touch bottom left brake button to slow down
